participant_1.background:

my friends like watching it to.

i sing in the shower.

content.text: I am doing well. Thanks for asking.
Glad to hear that. What's your favorite way to start the day?
I like to read a poem or two to get my creative juices flowing. What do you like to do?
I really enjoy reading poems too. I'm also trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
That's a great idea! I love to lamp. It makes our home feel really cozy.
Lamping? I've never heard of that before.
It's kind of like lighting candles, but with lamps. It creates a really nice ambiance.
That sounds really nice. I'll have to try that sometime.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. I love it!
That's great! I can't imagine being a teacher. I'm not that good at explaining things.
It's not as hard as you think. You just have to be patient and have a good sense of humor.
I guess I could do that. I'm always up for a challenge.
